General.Name: Dierig Holding AG
General.Description: Dierig Holding AG engages in textiles business in Germany and internationally. It offers raw and finished fabrics; and textiles for hotels, hospitals, and care facilities. The company also produces bed linen products under the Fleuresse and Kaeppel brands. In addition, it engages in the leasing and development of real estate. The company was founded in 1805 and is based in Augsburg, Germany. Dierig Holding AG is a subsidiary of Textil-Treuhand GmbH.
